item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, September 13, 2024 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Zero-Click Calendar invite – Critical zero-click vulnerability chain in macOS (273 points | 85 comments)
2. OpenAI threatens to revoke o1 access for asking it about its chain of thought (170 points | 53 comments)
3. Porting SBCL to the Nintendo Switch (260 points | 47 comments)
4. Charge Robotics (YC S21) is hiring MechEs to build robots that build solar farms ( | hide)
5. Defend against vampires with 10 gbps network encryption (94 points | 25 comments)
6. Janet Jackson had the power to crash laptop computers (2022) (42 points | 12 comments)
7. Martin Luther King Jr. In Berlin (51 points | 14 comments)
8. Show HN: FlowTracker – Track data flowing through Java programs (236 points | 29 comments)
9. Demographic decline: Greece faces alarming population collapse (25 points | 12 comments)
10. I Added SVG Maps to My Travel Posts (24 points | 4 comments)
11. CrowdStrike ex-employees: 'Quality control was not part of our process' (20 points | 3 comments)
12. Modular Monoliths Are a Good Idea (38 points | 17 comments)
13. JG Ballard's Apocalyptic Art (80 points | 18 comments)
14. FDA Authorizes First Over-the-Counter Hearing Aid Software (364 points | 209 comments)
15. Don't Take Advice from a Habsburg (30 points | 9 comments)
16. I Am Herman Melville (6 points | discuss)
17. Better-performing “25519” elliptic-curve cryptography (194 points | 69 comments)
18. Breaking Down OnlyFans' Economics (396 points | 698 comments)
19. OpenAI acknowledges new models increase risk of misuse to create bioweapons (9 points | 6 comments)
20. Build Simple Fuzzer (2020) (42 points | 8 comments)
21. The End Times have come for the Pinboard bookmarking service (84 points | 40 comments)
22. Ask HN: Device for Music and GPS (19 points | 27 comments)
23. How to Spot NASA's Solar Sail Demonstration Streaking Through the Night Sky (114 points | 32 comments)
24. DiyPresso: DIY Espresso Machine (252 points | 248 comments)
25. Irish museum solves mystery of Bronze Age axe heads delivered in porridge box (13 points | 1 comment)
26. Tailwind CSS vs. Pico CSS (2022) (50 points | 23 comments)
27. Notes on OpenAI's new o1 chain-of-thought models (620 points | 552 comments)
28. Academics say flying to meetings harms the climate – but they carry on (8 points | 1 comment)
29. The Spellbinding Life of Koji Kashin: Japan's Legendary Wandering Magician (48 points | 16 comments)
30. Show HN: A whiteboard that writes math equations (102 points | 49 comments)
